title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.12 - Videotape recording of depositions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.12 - Videotape recording of depositions

State Regulations

Depositions authorized under the provisions of
the CPLR or other law may be taken, as permitted by subdivision (b) of section
3113 of the CPLR, by means of simultaneous audio and visual electronic
recording, provided such recording is made in conformity with section
202.15
of the Rules of the Chief

Administrator (22 NYCRR Part
202
). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
210.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
